DOC.brief_title: Mass Balance Study JTZ-951 Subjects With End-stage Renal Disease Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Subjects end stage renal disease hemodialysis Postdialysis body weight > 45.0 kg BMI 18.0 40.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Subjects aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) > 2.0 × upper limit normal ( ULN ) , total bilirubin > 1.5 × ULN Screening Visit Subjects hepatobiliary disease condition ( biliary cirrhosis ) Subjects positive test result HBsAg ( hepatitis B surface antigen ) , HCV antibody HIV antibody Subjects know history liver failure liver surgery Subjects history current clinically significant chronic acute blood loss
